articles.title: Cricket SA's social justice hearings begin as ombud Dumisa Ntsebeza takes the conciliatory path - News24
articles.description: In quoting American novelist James Baldwin, Cricket South Africa's Cricket for Social Justice and Nation-building initiative hearings Advocate Dumisa Ntsebeza set the conciliatory tone of the hearings.
articles.content:
• Cricket South Africa's Cricket for Social Justice and Nation-building initiative ombudsman Advocate Dumisa Ntsebeza said the impact of the hearings is for them to be educational.
